name: chat-app
description: Real-time chat application with TypeScript backend and React frontend

scripts.build: npm run build:server && npm run build:web
scripts.lint: npm run lint:server && npm run lint:web
scripts.format: npm run format:server && npm run format:web
scripts.setup: npm run setup:server && npm run setup:web && npm run setup:e2e
scripts.setup:server: cd server && npm install && npx prisma generate && npx prisma db push
scripts.setup:e2e: cd e2e && npm install && npx playwright install
